title: Why can't I hear the caller during Duo calls and voice calls on speaker?
content:
I received my new Pixel 3 XL on Saturday.

I've noticed during voice calls placed onto speaker mode, and during Duo video calls, that I can't hear anything from the other end of the phone call. It's like I have the other person's mic. 

I have restarted the device and checked call volume is turned up, but to no avail.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
